Zend_Version

Zend_Version  
No 
Yes 

Description

Class to store and retrieve the version of Zend Framework.

Methods

compareVersion, getLatest,

compareVersion( string   $version, ) : int

Description

Compare the specified Zend Framework version string $version with the current Zend_Version::VERSION of Zend Framework.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$version string | A version string (e.g. "0.7.1").

Return value

Type Description
int -1 if the $version is older, 0 if they are the same, and +1 if $version is newer.

getLatest( ) : string

Description

Fetches the version of the latest stable release

Return value

Type Description
string

Tags

Name Description
link http://framework.zend.com/download/latest
